name: 古巫竞技场 Ancient Witch Arena
name_original: 古巫竞技场 Ancient Witch Arena
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2112200/_Ancient_Witch_Arena/



Game Features

  • 10 legendary heroes, all with their own powerful special skills.
  • More than 40 kinds hero skills, strategic choices, combine different fighting styles, and defeat powerful enemies in the battlefield.
  • Growth and upgrade Unlock skills, strengthen abilities, enter the battlefield, and experience the refreshing experience to upgrade again.
  • 8 kinds of fury modes, flexible use, greatly affect the battlefield situation.
  • Over 50 different types of enemies.
  • Many different styles of fantasy scenes.
  • Intense boss battles.
  • Dozens of epic music.
  • Battlefield random system Every battle has a different new experience.
